events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I don't need this product.
The issue has been classified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify and proceed with your refund?
My order number is 1234567890. Attached is a photo of the item I received, which is different from what I ordered.
We have verified your order and agree to issue a full refund immediately. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Thank you very much for the quick response and solution. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund.
Your refund request has been successfully processed and the case is now resolved. Please check your account in a few days.
Just following up to ensure that you have received your refund. If you need further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us.
This support case has been formally closed as the refund was completed and confirmed by the customer.
